tool_description: Generates automated alerts and notifications when agent performance metrics fall outside defined thresholds or show concerning trends.

alert_metrics.description: Performance metrics to monitor for alerts

threshold_values.description: Threshold values corresponding to each metric

alert_sensitivity.description: Sensitivity level for triggering alerts (low, medium, high)

notification_channels.description: Channels to send alerts to (email, dashboard, sms)

agent_scope.description: Specific agents to monitor, or null for all agents

alert_frequency.description: How often to check for alert conditions (real_time, hourly, daily)

business_hours_only.description: Whether to generate alerts only during business hours

minimum_data_points.description: Minimum number of data points required before generating alert

alert_priority.description: Priority level for generated alerts (low, medium, high, critical)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: alert_metrics and threshold_values arrays must have the same length.
Invalid alert metrics: Use supported metrics like 'handle_time', 'quality_score', 'resolution_rate'.
Invalid threshold values: All threshold values must be positive numbers appropriate for their metrics.
Invalid sensitivity level: Use 'low', 'medium', or 'high' for alert sensitivity.
Invalid notification channels: Use 'email', 'dashboard', or 'sms' for notification channels.
Invalid alert frequency: Use 'real_time', 'hourly', or 'daily' for alert frequency.
Invalid agent scope: One or more specified agent IDs do not exist in the system.
Invalid minimum data points: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 100.
Invalid alert priority: Use 'low', 'medium', 'high', or 'critical' for alert priority.
usage: Provide alert_metrics and corresponding threshold_values arrays as required parameters. Customize alert behavior with optional parameters like alert_sensitivity, notification_channels, agent_scope, alert_frequency, escalation_enabled, business_hours_only, minimum_data_points, and alert_priority.

alerts_generated.description: Number of alerts generated in this execution

alert_details.description: Details of each alert including metric, agent, and violation severity

escalated_alerts.description: Number of alerts that were escalated due to repeated violations

next_check_time.description: Timestamp for next scheduled alert check

monitoring_status.description: Status of the alert monitoring system (active, paused, error)
